title: My google pixel 1 is not working properly .. especially my mic and speaker not working
content: After the android 10 beta update all the application is getting crashed. And especially i not able to use my call logs. And call is not happening if anyone call or we called to anyone, its totally hanged and automatic reset is happening. Now mic and speaker is not working. but i able used in safe mode. please help me resolve this issue. Even authorized service center is not taking my phone to service. And they inform if its downgrade the software phone may go dead. please help me to resolve this issues
